document.full_text: an equine herpes outbreak has widened to include eight western u.s. states, with 33 horses confirmed to have the highly contagious disease, the u.s. department of agriculture said on thursday.
document.title: horse herpes outbreak in west grows to 33 cases
lines_and_colors: an equine herpes outbreak has widened to include eight western u.s. states, with 33 horses confirmed to have the highly contagious disease, the u.s. department of agriculture said on thursday.
